summary: Implements a Home Assistant device tracker platform that connects to an iCloud account to locate Apple devices. It manages authentication, session health, adaptive polling intervals, and interprets device status updates such as battery level, location accuracy, and lost-device conditions, exposing these details as tracker attributes.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor the presence and location of their Apple devices through iCloud, supporting automations that react to device arrival, departure, battery state, and other contextual information.
